flawed_nl_solution:
There are currently 9*22=<<9*22=198>>198 episodes out
The new season will have 22+4=<<22+4=26>>26 episodes
So the total number of episodes is 198+26=<<198+26=224>>224 episodes
So it will take 224*0.5=<<224*0.5=121>>121 hours to watch them all
#### 121

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 112, not 121. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
